column4: how are ati's current drivers for linux? more specifically for a radeon 4890, id like to try ubuntu once again but from what i remember a couple years back it was recommended to use nvidia on linux since ati's drivers were so crappy
go to www.ati.com   look in the top right corner of the page
i know how to find the drivers, id just like to know how they perform before i go ahead and install it on my machine
they are fine and give full 3d support assuming your xorg version is supported
